mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM company1 cp1 JOIN company cp ON cp1.companyIndex = cp.companyIndex

SELECT cp1.companyIndex, companyName, cp1.repname, cp1.repnumber, cp1.fax, cp1.businessNumber, cp1.businessPost, cp1.address1, cp1.address2, cc.chargeId, cc.chargeName, cc.chargeEmail, cc.chargeTel FROM company1 cp1 JOIN companyCharge cc ON cp1.companyIndex=cc.companyIndex LEFT OUTER JOIN companyCharge cc ON cp1.companyIndex = cc.companyIndex WHERE cp1.companyIndex = #{companyIndex}
